name: I Love Emus
description:
Inspired by historical events, race through the Outback as a soldier during the Emu Wars and capture all three safe houses while being attacked by mobs of emus. Fight back with your revolver and when you run out of ammo, throw it like a boomerang to return your bullets.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Sprint - Shift

Shoot - Left Click

Reload/Throw - Right Click

Aim for the Emu's neck and don't walk to the hill on the left or else you might fall through the map. 

Programming - Sam Keeley

Level Design & Sound Effects - Christ Hunt

3D Modeling- Courtney Cochran, Michael Insley, Christian Rucki, Tyla Chadwick

2D Art - Michael Insley, Tyla Chadwick
